hero.title: Sublet Management Made Simple
hero.subtitle: The easiest way to manage your sublet properties. Track rooms, tenants, and payments all in one place.

features.title: Everything you need to manage your sublets

roomManagement.title: Room Management
roomManagement.description: Manage multiple rooms with detailed tracking of availability and tenant assignments.

tenantManagement.title: Tenant Management
tenantManagement.description: Keep track of tenant information, agreements, and payment history in one place.

paymentTracking.title: Payment Tracking
paymentTracking.description: Track rental payments and deposits with automated status updates.

appeal.title: Transform Your Property Management Experience
appeal.subtitle: Join hundreds of property managers who have simplified their lives with BilikKu

timeSaving.title: Save 10+ Hours Weekly
timeSaving.description: Stop juggling spreadsheets and paperwork. Our automated system handles the tedious tasks, giving you back precious time to focus on what matters most.

stressReduction.title: Reduce Management Stress
stressReduction.description: Never miss a payment or forget a tenant request again. Our organized system keeps everything in check, bringing peace of mind to your property management.

financialControl.title: Better Financial Control
financialControl.description: Track every payment, deposit, and expense in real-time. Make informed decisions with clear financial insights at your fingertips.

growth.title: Scale Your Business
growth.description: Whether you manage 5 or 500 rooms, BilikKu grows with you. Our platform makes it easy to expand your property portfolio without the added stress.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.trialDescription: Try BilikKu free for 14 days. No credit card required.
